QuestData.Title: A Hero's Welcome
QuestData.Description: Prophet Velen has asked me to show you around Shadowmoon Valley.$B$BWe will go first to Embaari Village, where my sister Samaara is waiting for us. I have not seen her since the Iron Horde took me to Tanaan.$B$BThe village is just one of many trading villages between the Temple of Karabor and Shattrath.$B$BFollow the road east and make your way to Embaari Village. I will accompany you, my friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Samaara at Embaari Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, stranger! The Prophet spoke of new allies arriving on our shores.$B$BI hear it is thanks to you that my sister is safe.$B$BI owe you a great debt, friend.
